ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance Class 2b: Monitoring metadata for data sets and data set series
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines metadata records against the requirements for metadata in INSPIRE.

Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion.

Source: Conformance Class 2b: Monitoring metadata for data sets and data set series
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for metadata XML test objects

TestCase.label: Monitoring requirements
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for monitoring metadata.

TestAssertion.label: M.1: Spatial scope code list
TestAssertion.description:
Test that the spatial scope covered by the data set or data set series is provided.

More information: Spatial Scope Code List
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $descriptiveKeywords := if ($record/gmd:hierarchyLevel/gmd:MD_ScopeCode/@codeListValue = 'service') then $record/gmd:identificationInfo/srv:SV_ServiceIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords else $record/gmd:identificationInfo/gmd:MD_DataIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords let $keywordsAnchor := for $x in $descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:keyword/gmx:Anchor where ($x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/european' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/global' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/local' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/national' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/regional') return $x let $keywordsCharacterString := for $x in $descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:keyword/gco:CharacterString where ($x = 'European' or $x = 'Global' or $x = 'Local' or $x = 'National' or $x = 'Regional') return $x let $thesaurusNameTitle := if ($record/gmd:hierarchyLevel/gmd:MD_ScopeCode/@codeListValue = 'service') then $record/gmd:identificationInfo/srv:SV_ServiceIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:thesaurusName/gmd:CI_Citation/gmd:title else $record/gmd:identificationInfo/gmd:MD_DataIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:thesaurusName/gmd:CI_Citation/gmd:title let $validThesaurusNameTitle := for $x in $thesaurusNameTitle where ($x = 'Spatial scope' or $x/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope') return $x return if (count($keywordsAnchor) = 0 and count($keywordsCharacterString) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.manualCheckSpatialScope', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if ((count($keywordsAnchor) != 0 or count($keywordsCharacterString) != 0) and (count($validThesaurusNameTitle) = 0)) then local:addMessage('TR.spatialScopeCitationMissing', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else() )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages/@ref = 'TR.manualCheckSpatialScope') then 'PASSED_MANUAL' else if ($messages/@ref = 'TR.spatialScopeCitationMissing') then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
